meanings.definition: The quality of being brief and to the point.
meanings.sent1: Her terseness in the meeting made everyone understand quickly.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the terseness of his emails; they get straight to the point.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's terseness in explaining the math problem left the students puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The terseness of the judge's final statement left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent5: The terseness of the recipe made it easy for beginners to follow.
